channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: DOGE stimulus check update: Here's the latest news on the dividend and when it may arrive

Democratic-led cities and states push back on threats to cut US school funding over DEI
item.description: Some Democratic-led states and cities are pushing back on a Trump administration threat to cut education funding over diversity, equity, and inclusion...

item.title: Volcano eruption in the Philippines sends ash miles into the air
item.description: The area around Kanlaon Volcano in the Philippines was still under evacuation orders from an eruption in December​.

item.title: IRS will share taxpayer data with DHS about immigrants illegally in US
item.description: The IRS and DHS have reached a data-sharing agreement to support the Trump administration's immigration enforcement agenda, according to a court filin...

item.title: At least 44 killed by roof collapse at nightclub in Dominican Republic
item.description: The roof of the Jet Set nightclub in Santo Domingo fell in, killing more than 40 people and leaving many others injured or trapped under rubble.

item.title: 'Death sentence': Advocates blast $1.3 billion in State Department food aid cuts
item.description: The State Department has moved to squeeze lifesaving foreign aid dramatically around the world, according to several U.S. officials familiar with the ...

item.title: Supreme Court blocks order requiring Trump administration to reinstate thousands of federal workers
White House says 104% tariff on China will take effect Wednesday
item.description: China will face a 104% tariff on goods beginning Wednesday, the White House confirmed.

item.title: Trump touts falling oil prices, borrowing costs. Experts say they're warning signs.
item.description: Oil prices and treasury yields plummeted recently as tariffs roiled markets.

item.title: Trump tariffs live updates: 104% tariff rate on China to go into effect Wednesday
item.description: Trump's threatened additional 50% tariff on China will go into effect early Wednesday, bringing the total tariff rate against Beijing to 104%.

item.title: South Florida student born deaf excels in school thanks to determination
item.description: Edmund Polinski was recently awarded the President's Award for Outstanding Academic Excellence.
